description.content: Returns a specific authority by its ID

item.name: Fetch a parking Entity by ID

request.name: Fetch a parking Entity by ID

item.name: Fetch a parking quote by id

request.name: Fetch a parking quote by id

description.content:
Searches for a parking result with the supplied ID. Result indicates whether parking is allowed at the location.
If parking is allowed for all or part of the requested window,
the result contains a list of quotes containing information such as price, payment methods, maximum stay and no return policy.

Searches for a parking result with the supplied IDs. Result indicates whether parking is allowed at the location.
If parking is allowed for all or part of the requested window,
the result contains a list of quotes containing information such as price, payment methods, maximum stay and no return policy.

Returns the Ids of authorities that are at least partially within the specified GeoJson viewport.

item.name: Find parking entities by centre and viewport size

request.name: Find parking entities by centre and viewport size

description.content:
This query creates a square viewport with the centre at ViewportCentre and side length of ViewportSize.
It then returns a list of all the parking entities within the bounds of that polygon, along with their distance from the DistanceCalculationLocation if supplied,
or the viewport centre if not. Entities are ordered by this distance.

This query creates a custom viewport from the supplied GeoJson polygon.
It then returns a list of all the parking entities within the bounds of that polygon, along with their distance from the DistanceCalculationLocation if supplied,
or the viewport centre if not. Entities are ordered by this distance.

item.name: Find parking quotes by centre and viewport size

request.name: Find parking quotes by centre and viewport size

description.content:
This query creates a square viewport with the centre at ViewportCentre and side length of ViewportSize.
It then returns a list of search results for all parking entities within the bounds of that polygon.
Results are ordered by proximity to the DistanceCalculationLocation if supplied, or the viewport centre if not.
            
Each result indicates whether parking is allowed at that location. If parking is allowed for all or part of the requested window,
the result contains a list of quotes containing information such as price, payment methods, maximum stay and no return policy.

This query creates a custom viewport from the supplied GeoJson polygon.
It then returns a list of search results for all parking entities within the bounds of that polygon.
Results are ordered by proximity to the DistanceCalculationLocation if supplied, or the viewport centre if not.
            
Each result indicates whether parking is allowed at that location. If parking is allowed for all or part of the requested window,
the result contains a list of quotes containing information such as price, payment methods, maximum stay and no return policy.

item.name: Find zone default rules by viewport

request.name: Find zone default rules by viewport

description.content: Returns default rules for parking entities for zones that are at least partially within the specified GeoJson viewport.
